attributes.action: Remove State Pensions from Income Tax to avoid supporting those on Job Seekers Allowance with no intention of seeking work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The national press continually carries reports of people on job seekers allowance who refuse to look for work as they are better off on benefits. And they are certainly better off than I am as a result.   Why should I have to continue to support them through the Income Tax I pay on my State Pension?

rejection.details: there are lots of petitions already with similar themes
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
